Verses: 1 en Dhevane, En Saththurukkalukku Ennaith Thappuviyum; Enmel Ezhumbugiravargalukku Ennai Vilakki Uyarndha Adaikkalaththile Vaiyum.
2 akkiramakkaararukku Ennaith Thappuviththu, Raththappiriyaraana Manusharukku Ennai Vilakki Ratchiyum.
3 idho, En Piraananukkup Padhivirukkiraargal; Karththaave, Ennidaththil Meerudhalum Paavamum Illaadhirundhum, Balavaangal Enakku Virodhamaaik Koottankoodugiraargal.
4 ennidaththil Akkiramam Illaadhirundhum, Odiththirindhu Yuththaththukku Aayaththamaagiraargal; Enakkuth Thunaiseyya Vizhiththu Ennai Nokkip Paarum.
5 senaigalin Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Isravelin Thevane, Neer Sagala Jaadhigalaiyum Visaarikka Vizhiththezhumbum; Vanjagamaaith Dhuroganjeygira Oruvarukkum Thayai Seyyaadheyum. (selaa.)
6 avargal Saayangaalaththil Thirumbivandhu, Naaigalaippola Oolaiyittu, Ooraichsutrith Thirigiraargal.
7 idho, Thangal Vaarththaigalaik Kakkugiraargal; Avargal Udhadugalil Pattayangal Irukkiradhu, Ketkiravan Yaar Engiraargal.
8 aanaalum Karththaave, Neer Avargalaip Paarththu Nagaippeer; Purajaadhigal Yaavaraiyum Igazhuveer.
9 avan Vallamaiyai Naan Kandu, Umakkuk Kaaththiruppen; Dhevane Enakku Uyarndha Adaikkalam.
10 en Dhevan Thammudaiya Kirubaiyinaal Ennaich Sandhippaar; Dhevan En Saththurukkalukku Varum Needhisarikkattudhalai Naan Kaanumpadi Seyvaar.
11 avargalaik Kondrupodaadheyum, En Janangal Marandhupovaargale; Engal Kedagamaagiya Aandavare, Umadhu Vallamaiyinaal Avargalaich Sidharadiththu, Avargalaith Thaazhththippodum.
12 avargal Udhadugalin Pechchu Avargal Vaayin Paavamaayirukkiradhu; Avargal Itta Saabamum Solliya Poiyum Aagiya Ivaigalinimiththam Thangal Perumaiyil Agappaduvaargalaaga.
13 dhevan Boomiyin Ellaivaraikkum Yaakkobile Arasaalugiravar Endru Avargal Ariyumporuttu, Avargalai Ummudaiya Ukkiraththile Nirmoolamaakkum; Ini Iraadhapadikku Avargalai Nirmoolamaakkum. (selaa.)
14 avargal Saayangaalaththil Thirumbivandhu, Naaigalaippola Oolaiyittu, Ooraichsutrith Thirigiraargal.
15 avargal Unavukkaaga Alaindhu Thirindhu Thirupthiyadaiyaamal, Murumuruththukkondiruppaargal.
16 naano Ummudaiya Vallamaiyaip Paadi, Kaalaiyile Ummudaiya Kirubaiyai Magizhchchiyodu Pugazhuven; Enakku Nerukkamundaana Naalile Neer Enakkuth Thanjamum Uyarndha Adaikkalamumaaneer.
17 en Belane, Ummaik Keerththanampannuven; Dhevan Enakku Uyarndha Adaikkalamum, Kirubaiyulla En Dhevanumaayirukkiraar.
